name: The Best PC
tag_list: buy-the-best-pc, find-the-best-pc, order-the-best-pc, build-the-best-pc, best-desktop-pc, best-pc-parts
description: Offers the best PC on the market
overview:
The Best PC offers the user a unique view of the best computer components and complete computer builds on the market. On the home page of the site is a view of the single best computer on the market, handpicked by the staff at The Best PC using the most accurate and trusted benchmarks and consumer reviews available. The user can then further customize the computer by adding or removing parts and extras such as Memory, Monitors, Keyboards, etc. The user can then purchase the computer directly from Newegg, an award wining and trusted online realtor.

The site also offers other builds such as a 2000, 1000, and 600 dollar build. These builds are similar to the original “best” build, only slightly cheaper. They are they best builds for their price point.
